# my-invite Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-09

## Active Technologies
- JavaScript (ES2022) + Vue (project uses Vue via src/main.js) + Vite, Vue — NO new runtime dependencies (conforms to constitution) (001-add-pixel-hearts)

- JavaScript (ES2020+) + Vue 3 (Composition API) + Vue 3 (35KB gzipped); Vite (dev-time bundler) (001-cute-invite)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

JavaScript (ES2020+) + Vue 3 (Composition API): Follow standard conventions
